FuncDef:
The snmp-agent trap source ipv6 ipv6-address command is used to configure the SNMP trap IPv6 source address.
The undo snmp-agent trap source ipv6 command is used to clear the SNMP trap IPv6 source address.
By default, snmp-agnet trap source IP is not enabled.

ParaDef.Info:
SNMP Trap source IPv6 address.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

ExtraInfo: Device use the configured IPv6 address as the source address when sending trap / inform to the IPv6 target host.
